Class PropertyManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.utils.PropertyManager
public class PropertyManager extends Object
Utility class to manage property-related operations. Provides methods for filtering, retrieving unique locations, and finding adjacent properties.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor for PropertyManager.

  • Constructor Details

    • PropertyManager

      public PropertyManager()
      Constructor for PropertyManager. Initializes the list of properties by reading data from a CSV file using CsvToPropertyReader.

  • Method Details

    • filterProperties

      public List<Property> filterProperties(String filterType, String location)
      Filters properties based on a given type and location.
      Parameters:
      filterType - The type of filter: "freguesia", "municipio", or "ilha".
      location - The location name to filter by.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of Property objects matching the given criteria.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the filter type is invalid.

    • getUniqueLocations

      public Set<String> getUniqueLocations(String filterType)
      Retrieves unique locations based on a given filter type.
      Parameters:
      filterType - The type of filter: "freguesia", "municipio", or "ilha".
      Returns:
      A set of unique location names.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the filter type is invalid.

    • getProperties

      public List<Property> getProperties()
      Retrieves the list of all properties.
      Returns:
      The complete list of properties managed by this instance.

    • getAdjacentProperties

      public Set<Property> getAdjacentProperties(Property property)
      Finds and retrieves adjacent properties for a given property.
      Parameters:
      property - The property for which adjacent properties are to be found.
      Returns:
      A set of adjacent properties.
